overview:
Simon is the technical lead behind Omnisio.

Simon’s expertise encompasses many areas of engineering, from high-performance networking to machine learning and optimization, and now, web-based video delivery.

Prior to starting Omnisio, Simon was a Senior Software Engineer at Sensory Networks. As one of the first employees Simon helped shape many of the company’s products, and later lead the development of its flagship intrusion detection and prevention solution.

He holds a Master’s Degree in Electrical Engineering from Stanford University, as well as dual Bachelor’s degrees in Software Engineering and Biochemistry from the University of Sydney.
